title: Infinite Lucky Emperor - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Horror   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Alternate World   Archery   Arrogant Characters   Bloodlines   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Confident Protagonist   Couple Growth   Cultivation   Devoted Love Interests   Fast Learner   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Introverted Protagonist   Kingdoms   Level System   Lucky Protagonist   Magic   Magical Space   Mature Protagonist   Medieval   Military   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Parallel Worlds   Persistent Love Interests   Pets   Power Couple   Psychic Powers   Saving the World   Sharp-tongued Characters   Shy Characters   Skill Assimilation   Smart Couple   Soul Power   Spirits   Strategic Battles   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Survival Game   System Administrator   Teamwork   Unlimited Flow   Weak to Strong   Wizards   World Hopping
author: Yishui Qingping   一水清平
description:
As a game designer, Xia Ruize loves to play games, but he doesn't like to play games with lottery, because he is too lucky and has less fun.

Until one day,

Xia Ruize fell into a real infinite survival game, relying on excellent luck to survive in a desperate situation. He finally realized that being lucky was cool for a while, and being lucky has always been cool!>
